response.original_title: I Got Rhythm: The Science of Song
response.overview: Melodies ring out at every important human activity â€“ from romancing mates to soothing babies, from worshipping to mourning, celebrating to protesting.  What triggers this response in humans? Are we hardwired for music? What power does music have over our bodies and our brains? Scientists have only recently begun to seriously examine how and why music has such a profound impact on us.
response.title: I Got Rhythm: The Science of Song
